articles.title: Exclusive: Nintendo ships 1 million Switches in China since late-2019 launch - Reuters
articles.description: Nintendo Co Ltd has shipped 1 million Switch consoles in China since it launched the device in the world's largest video games market at the end of 2019, its Chinese partner Tencent Holdings Ltd said on Monday.
